summary: Make Magic Armor Spell such as Oakflesh truly fortify caster\'s body with not only fortify armor rating but also fortify caster\'s fist!
descriptionHtml:
In my opinion, magic armor spell such as Stoneflesh was intended to fortify caster\'s body as strong as stone (or iron if it\'s Ironflesh spell). But unfortunately the magic armor spells effects tend to forgot that caster\'s fist should also become stronger. This simple mod change all magic armor spell to include fortify unarmed effects.

- Oakflesh add 20 points unarmed damage.
- Stoneflesh add 30 points unarmed damage.
- Ironflesh add 40 points unarmed damage.
- Ebonyflesh add 50 points unarmed damage.
- Dragonhide add 75 points unarmed damage.

I also add optional weaker version with half damage from above if you feel the original is overpowered.

This is my first mod, please go easy on me.

Note : this mod will conflict with any mod that modify magic armor spells.

My other mods:
- Magic Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14825)
- Shout Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14523)
- Assasin Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14929)
- Daedric Artifacts Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15667)
- Craftable Scythes (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17821)
author: BtyoP
